statements: DELETE FROM landmark_court_decisions WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court' AND plaintiffs = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM landmark_court_decisions WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court' AND decision_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM case_analysis WHERE analysis_id = 100 AND researcher_id = 5;
DELETE FROM landmark_court_decisions WHERE case_name = 'Landmark Case 1';
DELETE FROM legal_arguments WHERE argument_type = 'Constitutional Law';
DELETE FROM legal_arguments WHERE argument_type = 'legal precedent';
DELETE FROM judges WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court' AND years_on_bench < 10;
DELETE FROM parties WHERE party_name = 'XYZ Corp';
DELETE FROM parties WHERE party_name = 'ABC Corp' AND role = 'Plaintiff';
